tswitem.name: Signet of Coup De Grâce
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Coup De Grâce
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you hit a target who is below 35% health, you have a 33% chance to deal an additional 150-300/300-600/450-900 physical damage to that target. Damage dealt increases the closer the target gets to death. This Signet can be attached to Major Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
